title-group.article-title: Land-Based Aircraft Options for Naval Missions

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright Â© Society of Automotive Engineers, Inc. 1978

abstract.p: Advances in aeronautical technology favor increased application of land-based aircraft to naval missions. A number of aircraft types now combine attractive mission capabilities with good coverage of ocean areas from available bases. Further developments can be expected to improve mission capabilities and/or range. The result is a broader range of options for naval planners.
